languages.text: All enemies in combat immediately suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. The level of each effect is equal to <u>(character's level / 10)</u>.

traits.locale_text: All enemies in combat are immediately affected by Bleed (Level / 10), Burn (Level / 10) and Toxin (Level / 10).

All enemies in combat immediately suffer bleeding <u>(Executioner's level / 10)</u>, burning <u>(Executioner's level / 10)</u>, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} <u>(Executioner's level / 10)</u>.

languages.text: Todos los enemigos en combate sufren de inmediato {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}. El nivel de cada efecto es igual a <u>(nivel del personaje / 10)</u>.

traits.locale_text: Todos los enemigos en combate sufren de inmediato {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}. El nivel de cada efecto es igual a <u>(nivel del personaje / 10)</u>.

languages.text: 戦闘中の敵全体は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}状態になる。各効果のレベルは<u>(キャラクターのレベル / 10)</u>になる。
languages.original_text: All enemies in combat immediately suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. The level of each effect is equal to <u>(character's level / 10)</u>.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中の敵全体は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態になる。各効果のレベルは<u>(キャラクターのレベル / 10)</u>になる。

languages.text: 战场上的所有敌人立刻受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果影响，每种效果的强度等级等同于<u>（角色等级/10）</u>。
languages.original_text: All enemies in combat immediately suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. The level of each effect is equal to <u>(character's level / 10)</u>.

traits.locale_text: 战场上的所有敌人立刻受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果影响，每种效果的强度等级等同于<u>（角色等级/10）</u>。

languages.text: Alle Gegner im Kampf werden sofort mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} belegt. Die Stufe der einzelnen Effekte entspricht <u>(Charakterstufe / 10)</u>.
languages.original_text: All enemies in combat immediately suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. The level of each effect is equal to <u>(character's level / 10)</u>.

traits.locale_text: Alle Gegner im Kampf werden sofort mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} belegt. Die Stufe der einzelnen Effekte entspricht <u>(Charakterstufe / 10)</u>.

languages.text: Tous les ennemis en combat se voient immédiatement infliger les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}. Le niveau de chaque effet est équivalent à <u>(niveau du personnage / 10)</u>.
languages.original_text: All enemies in combat immediately suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. The level of each effect is equal to <u>(character's level / 10)</u>.

traits.locale_text: Tous les ennemis en combat se voient immédiatement infliger les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}. Le niveau de chaque effet est équivalent à <u>(niveau du personnage / 10)</u>.

languages.text: На всех противников в бою немедленно накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Уровень каждого из эффектов равен <u>(уровень персонажа / 10)</u>.
